column4: LOL, compared to CentOS? Wow you got a real uphill battle there bro
CentOS gave me more grief than any other distro (including ubuntu) when it came to sys admin/setup
I use CentOS for server purposes on my headless box and it's never given me a single problem.
Any issues you may have run into is probably just the difference between a Debian based system and a RHEL-like system.
